text: Eitan Haber (, born 12 March 1940 â€“ 7 October 2020) was an Israeli journalist and publicist. He was known for his writing on military and security issues. He was a close ally and advisor to Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin. Haber was born in Tel Aviv. He worked for Yedioth Ahronoth as a correspondent on military issues. Haber died on 7 October 2020 in Tel Aviv from pancreatic cancer at the age of 80.Eitan Haber, former advisor to Yitzhak Rabin, passes away at age 80 ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli journalists Category:Israeli writers Category:Political commentators
title: Eitan Haber
